alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:26AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Grant, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1026 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thiel, or 12 miles west of Sheridan, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan... Leola... Prattsville... Poyen... Lamont... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Thiel... Dogwood... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Belfast... Ain... Lono... Gifford... Buie... Center Grove... Clear Lake... Hardin... Millerville... Cross Roads in Grant County... Fenter... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
